amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 117-9 to lower the mandatory minimum voting age in Federal elections to 16 years of age.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to lower the mandatory minimum voting age in Federal elections to 16 years of age.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A008) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 125 - 302 (Roll no. 57).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A008) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Pressley.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A008) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 125 - 302 (Roll no. 57).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A008) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 125 - 302 (Roll no. 57).
